title: DNSimple
description:
Everyone’s “simple” is different. Developers and system admins love our single-click integrations and self-serve automation tools for domains, DNS, SLL, and more. Enterprise teams simplify management of the most complex domain portfolios through our NEW Domain Control Plane. 

Whether you manage one domain or 100,000 domains, DNSimple delivers simple, secure domain management solutions. Learn more -> dnsimple.com
